answers.answer: Probably send u for blood work and ur glucose test and most likely ur 20 weeks ultrasound
I had blood work and ultrasound my first appointment

If you have only had the one ultrasound they will probably do another one, you will be given a referral for thw glucose testing and will probably have other routine blood tests such as iron. They will probably feel your stomach and check the baby's heart rate, you will probably give a urine sample to check for proteins (screening for preeclampsia) and your blood pressure and weight will be taken.
Okay thank you that was much help! (:

question: This is my second appointment (due to insurance issues) and I was wondering exactly what all they will be doing tomorrow ?
title: 25 weeks appointment
